secrets.description: PostgreSQL connection string (auto-set by Replit DB)
Stripe publishable key (starts with pk_test_ or pk_live_)
Stripe secret key (starts with sk_test_ or sk_live_)
Stripe webhook signing secret (starts with whsec_)

steps.title: 1. Click Run
steps.description: The dashboard will start with demo data - no config needed!

steps.title: 2. Add Stripe Keys (Optional)
steps.description: Go to Secrets tab and add STRIPE_PUBLIC_KEY and STRIPE_SECRET_KEY to enable payments

steps.title: 3. Create Stripe Products
steps.description: Run: node scripts/setup-stripe-products.js to automatically create Pro & Enterprise plans
